issue.title: [CF 743] Meta icon doesn't take into account any sub-icons duration requirements.
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 5.1.1.584, Microsoft Windows NT 6.2.9200.0

Installed Version

6.1.1

Description

If you make an icon, that has its minimum duration set to 12 seconds. If you add this then to a meta icon, the original icon will disappear normally after the duration goes below 12 seconds, but the meta icon will be left hanging.

Steps to Reproduce

Create an buff icon, for say Blessing of the Celestials, and set the minimum duration requirement to say, 12 seconds. Create a meta icon and tie this to the icon you made above - they should now show at identical times, but they don't.

Installed Addons

_NPCScan - _NPCScan 5.0.0.5 Addon Control Panel - 3.4.1 Auctionator - Version 3.1.0 Auctioneer - AuctioneerSuite-5.15.5383 BadBoy: Spam Blocker & Reporter - v11.424 BadBoy_CCleaner: Filter Crap From Chat - v3.62 BagSync - v7.1 BalancePowerTracker - BalancePowerTracker(v1.3.4) Bartender4 - 4.5.8 Battle Pet - Quality Notifier - Battle Pet - Quality Notifier 1.3.0 clcInfo - v.1.5.10.002 clcInfo_Monk - 1.0.4.2 clcInfo_Warlock - v0.2.0b CombustionHelper - CombustionHelper 3.4.2 Crap Away! - Crap Away! 1.9 DBM-SpellTimers (Deadly Boss Mods) - DBM-SpellTimers r84 Deadly Boss Mods - 5.1.0 ErrorFilter - v2.7 GladiatorlosSA - 2.0.2 Gladius - 5.1-04 Grail - 043 GTFO - 4.18.1 Guild Bank Repair Toggle - 1.0.1 Hear Kitty - 1.4.3 Hermes - v2.5.2 LibRangeCheck-2.0 - v3.7.2 Masque - v5.1.389 Masque: Caith - v5.1.82 MikScrollingBattleText - v5.7.125 MoveAnything - 13.4.0 OmniCC - 5.1.3 Postal - v3.5.1 Prat 3.0 - 3.5.3 RaidBuffStatus - 5.3.3 ReforgeLite - v1.23 Retribution FCFS helper (clcret) - v.1.5.10.002 RSA - Raeli's Spell Announcer - v2851 SexyMap - v2.4.1 Shadowed Unit Frames - v3.7.4 Skada Damage Meter - 1.4-8 SlashIn ( /in ) - v1.0.6 SpellStealer - v1.80 StaggerMeter - v2.01 TellMeWhen - 6.1.1 Tidy Plates - 6.8.2 TomTom - v50100-1.0.1 WeakAuras - 1.4.7.8 Wholly - 028 WIM (WoW Instant Messenger) v3 - 3.6.3 WIM_Elvui - V2.5 VuhDo - VuhDo 3.25


> Posted by CurseForge user shinpou | Imported from CurseForge issue #743 | Raw

comments.body:
It seems that Max duration requirements are working just fine. Minimum duration requirements, on the other hand, are not.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Fixed in r708. Sorry about taking so long on this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
